page.title: 16CHARITY EVENTS IN BURWELL
page.content: In Burwell, at{August Bank Holiday, there is a{Charity Gala}held for {M.A.G.P.A.S.}(a doctors' accident service) and{the Cub/Scout group.}Many people come.It is held in the gardens of{The Fox}pub.Lots of things happen there such as a coconut shy,wheel of fortune, tip the lady out of bed,as well as groups playing from a lorry used as a stage. Other ways of getting funds in the village are{car-boot sales}where people sell things from their car boots.{Toy,book and jumble sales}are also held.There are{cake stalls on the {High St.and Causeway.} Many people go to{Discos}but some cost as much as 50p. { A fishing match}for Burwell youngsters under 16 takes place on {Burwell Lode.}About 20 took part this year.Everyone receives a prize.
